TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWaitHandle extends System.Threading.WaitHandle

summary.span: 表示執行緒同步處理事件。

span.span: Represents a thread synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓執行緒藉由發出訊號，與彼此進行通訊。The class allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 一般而言，一個或多個執行緒封鎖之前解除封鎖的執行緒呼叫方法時，釋出一或多個遭封鎖的執行緒。Typically, one or more threads block on an until an unblocked thread calls the method, releasing one or more of the blocked threads. 執行緒可以發出信號，然後被阻斷，藉由呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。A thread can signal an and then block on it, by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. > [!NOTE] > 類別提供存取具名的系統同步處理事件。The class provides access to named system synchronization events. 行為，已收到信號取決於其重設 」 模式。The behavior of an that has been signaled depends on its reset mode. 以建立旗標會自動重設時收到信號時，在釋出單一等候執行緒後。An created with the flag resets automatically when signaled, after releasing a single waiting thread. 搭配 旗標建立的 會維持已收到訊號的狀態，直到其 方法被呼叫為止。An created with the flag remains signaled until its method is called. 自動重設事件會提供資源的獨佔存取權。Automatic reset events provide exclusive access to a resource. 如果自動重設事件在沒有任何執行緒處於等候狀態時收到訊號，它會維持收到訊號的狀態，直到有執行緒嘗試等候它為止。If an automatic reset event is signaled when no threads are waiting, it remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it. 此事件會釋出執行緒並立即重設，以阻斷後續的執行緒。The event releases the thread and immediately resets, blocking subsequent threads. 手動重設事件就像是大門。Manual reset events are like gates. 當事件不會發出訊號時，則會封鎖等候它的執行緒。When the event is not signaled, threads that wait on it will block. 當事件收到訊號時，會釋放所有等候中執行緒，而事件會維持收到訊號的狀態 （也就是，就不會封鎖後續的等待） 直到其呼叫方法。When the event is signaled, all waiting threads are released, and the event remains signaled (that is, subsequent waits do not block) until its method is called. 手動重設事件執行緒在其他執行緒可以繼續之前，必須完成活動時很有用。Manual reset events are useful when one thread must complete an activity before other threads can proceed. 物件可以搭配`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)和方法。 objects can be used with the `static`(`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods. 如需執行緒的同步處理機制的詳細資訊，請參閱[EventWaitHandle、 AutoResetEvent、 CountdownEvent、 ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。For more information about thread synchronization mechanisms, see [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號已封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後釋放一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列的另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Managed Threading
EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, and ManualResetEvent

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public EventWaitHandle (bool initialState, System.Threading.EventResetMode mode);

Public Sub New (initialState As Boolean, mode As EventResetMode)
public: EventWaitHandle(bool initialState, System::Threading::EventResetMode mode);
new System.Threading.EventWaitHandle : bool * System.Threading.EventResetMode -> System.Threading.EventWaitHandle

param.name: initialState
param.span: 表示初始狀態設定為已收到信號， 表示初始狀態設定為未收到信號。

span.span: to set the initial state to signaled; to set it to nonsignaled.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個 值，決定事件是否要自動或手動重設。

span.span: One of the values that determines whether the event resets automatically or manually.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體、指定等候控制代碼是否一開始就會收到信號，以及是以自動還是手動方式來重設。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled, and whether it resets automatically or manually.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未收到信號的事件的初始狀態，將會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，也不會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，並`mode`是等待事件的第一個執行緒就會釋出立即，其後會重設事件，且將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號已封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後釋放一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列的另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, and ManualResetEvent

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool initialState, valuetype System.Threading.EventResetMode mode, string name) cil managed
Public Sub New (initialState As Boolean, mode As EventResetMode, name As String)
public: EventWaitHandle(bool initialState, System::Threading::EventResetMode mode, System::String ^ name);
new System.Threading.EventWaitHandle : bool * System.Threading.EventResetMode * string -> System.Threading.EventWaitHandle

param.name: initialState
param.span: 如果已因此呼叫而建立具名事件，則為 以將初始狀態設定為收到信號；否則為 以將其設定為未收到信號。

span.span: to set the initial state to signaled if the named event is created as a result of this call; to set it to nonsignaled.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個 值，決定事件是否要自動或手動重設。

span.span: One of the values that determines whether the event resets automatically or manually.

param.name: name
param.span: 整個系統的同步處理事件名稱。

span.span: The name of a system-wide synchronization event.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體、指定等候控制代碼是否一開始就會收到信號 (如果它是因這個呼叫而建立)、是以自動還是手動方式進行重設，以及系統同步處理事件的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, and the name of a system synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`已`null`或空字串，本機建立。If `name` is `null` or an empty string, a local is created. 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已存在，`initialState`參數會被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當使用這個建構函式的具名的系統事件，指定`false`針對`initialState`。When using this constructor for named system events, specify `false` for `initialState`. 這個建構函式會提供任何方法來判斷是否已建立具名的系統事件，因此您不能做出任何假設具名事件的狀態。This constructor provides no way to determine whether a named system event was created, so you cannot make any assumptions about the state of the named event. 若要判斷是否已建立具名的事件，請使用建構函式或建構函式。To determine whether a named event was created, use the constructor or the constructor. 如果未收到信號的事件的初始狀態，將會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，也不會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，並`mode`是等待事件的第一個執行緒就會釋出立即，其後會重設事件，且將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

span.span: A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: 具名事件存在，並具有存取控制安全性，但使用者沒有 。

exception.span: 無法建立具名事件，可能是因為不同類型的等候控制代碼具有相同的名稱。

span.span: The named event cannot be created, perhaps because a wait handle of a different type has the same name.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定如果等候控制代碼是因此呼叫而建立，一開始是否會發出信號；它是否會自動或手動重設；系統同步處理事件的名稱；以及布林值變數，其值會在呼叫之後指出是否已建立具名系統事件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, and a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已存在，`initialState`參數會被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 之後呼叫這個建構函式，使用指定的變數中的值`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中的參數)`createdNew`以判斷是否具名的系統事件已經存在，或已建立。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic)`createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果未收到信號的事件的初始狀態，將會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，也不會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，並`mode`是等待事件的第一個執行緒就會釋出立即，其後會重設事件，且將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

span.span: An object that represents the access control security to be applied to the named system event.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定如果等候控制代碼是因此呼叫而建立，一開始是否會發出信號；它是否會自動或手動重設；系統同步處理事件的名稱；布林值變數，其值會在呼叫之後指出是否已建立具名系統事件；以及要套用至具名事件 (如果已建立) 的存取控制項安全性。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created, and the access control security to be applied to the named event if it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式套用到具名的系統事件建立時，防止其他程式碼事件的控制的存取控制安全性。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system event when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the event. 這個建構函式初始化物件，代表系統事件。This constructor initializes an object that represents a system event. 您可以建立多個代表相同的系統事件的物件。You can create multiple objects that represent the same system event. 如果系統事件不存在，它會建立具有指定的存取控制安全性。If the system event does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果此事件存在，則會忽略指定的存取控制安全性。If the event exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端具有全權掌控新建物件，即使`eventSecurity`拒絕，或無法授與給目前的使用者部分存取權限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `eventSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 不過，如果目前的使用者嘗試取得另一個物件代表相同具名事件，使用建構函式或方法，套用存取控制安全性的 Windows。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named event, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已存在，`initialState`參數會被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 之後呼叫這個建構函式，使用指定的變數中的值`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中的參數)`createdNew`以判斷是否具名的系統事件已經存在，或已建立。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic) `createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果未收到信號的事件的初始狀態，將會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，也不會封鎖等候事件的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果已收到訊號的初始狀態，並`mode`是等待事件的第一個執行緒就會釋出立即，其後會重設事件，且將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它會建立初始擁有權與拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但會授與讀取和變更事件的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來等候事件來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並對其發出通知所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，範例會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. summary.span: 取得 物件，表示目前 物件代表之具名系統事件的存取控制安全性。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the access control security for the named system event represented by the current object.

returns.span: 表示具名系統事件存取控制安全性的 物件。

span.span: An object that represents the access control security for the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用下列旗標 （使用位元 OR 運算結合） 的組合來搜尋權限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和事件的權限必須是與開啟旗標。The user must have rights to call this method, and the event must have been opened with the flag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它會建立初始擁有權與拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但會授與讀取和變更事件的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來等候事件來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限已閱讀、 使用之後方法，而且變更，事件會開啟在其上等候，並對其發出通知所需的權限。After the permissions have been read, using the method, and changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，範例會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名同步處理事件 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens a specified named synchronization event, if it already exists.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting (string name);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenExisting (name As String) As EventWaitHandle
public: static System::Threading::EventWaitHandle ^ OpenExisting(System::String ^ name);
static member OpenExisting : string -> System.Threading.EventWaitHandle

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟的系統同步處理事件名稱。

span.span: The name of the system synchronization event to open.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名同步處理事件 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists.

returns.span: 表示具名系統事件的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試開啟指定的具名的系統事件。The method tries to open the specified named system event. 如果系統事件不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立系統事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒等候具名的系統事件，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它會建立初始擁有權與拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但會授與讀取和變更事件的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來等候事件來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並對其發出通知所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，範例會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`參數必須包含旗標，好讓執行緒等候事件，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 方法嘗試開啟現有的具名的系統事件。The method tries to open an existing named system event. 如果系統事件不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立系統事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它會建立初始擁有權與拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但會授與讀取和變更事件的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來等候事件來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並對其發出通知所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，範例會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. .method public hidebysig instance bool Set() cil managed
Public Function Set () As Boolean

summary.span: 將事件的狀態設定為收到信號，允許一個或多個等待中的執行緒繼續執行。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to signaled, allowing one or more waiting threads to proceed.

returns.span: 如果作業成功，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the operation succeeds; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對具有(包括)，則方法會釋放單一執行緒。For an with (including ), the method releases a single thread. 如果沒有任何等候中執行緒，等候控制代碼直到已收到訊號的執行緒嘗試等候它，或直到其呼叫方法。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不保證，每次呼叫方法會釋放執行緒其重設 模式是。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread from an whose reset mode is . 如果兩個呼叫太接近，以便之前已釋放執行緒，就會發生在第二個呼叫，會釋放只有一個執行緒。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 這是因為如果第二次呼叫未發生。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果沒有等待的執行緒時，會呼叫和已收到訊號，呼叫沒有任何作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. 針對具有(包括)，則呼叫方法會等候控制代碼保留在收到信號的狀態，直到其呼叫方法。For an with (including ), calling the method leaves the wait handle in a signaled state until its method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號已封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後釋放一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列的另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和事件的權限必須是與開啟旗標。The user must have rights to call this method, and the event must have been opened with the flag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它會建立初始擁有權與拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但會授與讀取和變更事件的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來等候事件來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限，使用後事件的方法，會開啟在其上等候，並對其發出通知所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, using the method, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，範例會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. param.span: 這個方法傳回時，如果呼叫成功，則包含 物件，此物件代表具名同步處理事件，如果呼叫失敗，則為 。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named synchronization event if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

param.span: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名同步處理事件 (如果已經存在)，並傳回值，指出作業是否成功。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果已成功開啟具名同步處理事件，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the named synchronization event was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名同步處理事件不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定是否存在的具名同步處理事件，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，則會擲回例外狀況，如果同步處理事件不存在。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒等候具名的系統事件，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

span.span: is an empty string.
-or-

span.span: is longer than 260 characters.
is .
A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: 具名事件存在，但使用者沒有所需的安全性存取權。

span.span: The named event exists, but the user does not have the desired security access.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟的系統同步處理事件名稱。

span.span: The name of the system synchronization event to open.

param.name: rights
param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，表示所需的安全性存取。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that represent the desired security access.

param.name: result
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，如果呼叫成功，則包含 物件，此物件代表具名同步處理事件，如果呼叫失敗，則為 。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 使用所需的安全性存取權，開啟指定的具名同步處理事件 (如果已經存在)，並傳回值，指出作業是否成功。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists, with the desired security access, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果已成功開啟具名同步處理事件，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the named synchronization event was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名同步處理事件不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定是否存在的具名同步處理事件，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，則會擲回例外狀況，如果同步處理事件不存在。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. `rights`參數必須包含旗標，好讓執行緒等候事件，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.
